explanation: Iteratively sends WOL magic packets to multiple targets, enabling several devices via network signaling. Detection: alert on repeated outbound UDP 7/9 broadcasts in short intervals and correlate with process lineage invoking WakeMeOnLan.exe.
rationale_steps: Loop through a list of target MAC addresses.
Generate a valid WOL magic packet for each target to wake devices.
Throttle with short sleeps to avoid packet drops.
Detect by monitoring bursty UDP 9 traffic and execution of the WOL utility.
